description.value: When spending a fate point to activate Pure Faith, extend effects to 2x WP Bonus Targets. Can bestow a Fate point as a free action, that returns at the end of the encounter if unspent. When burning a fate point, Explorer and 2xWP Bonus Allies become immune to Daemonic Presence, Fear, and Corruption Tests, gain +10 to Resist Psychic Attack or Manipulation, and take half Damage from psychic and warp sources until the end of the encounter.
